name: china_osm_v301_10000m
title: Locations of Chinese development projects - 10km Buffer (GeoGCDF v3.0.1)
description: Locations of Chinese development projects from AidData's Global Chinese Development Finance Dataset v3.0.1. These boundaries represent a subset of projects from the dataset for which locations were found using OpenStreetMaps. For all locations a 10km buffer was applied.

options.group_title: Global Chinese Development Finance - AidData v3.0.1

extras.citation: Goodman, S., Zhang, S., Malik, A.A., Parks, B.C., Hall, J. 2024. AidData's Geospatial Global Chinese Development Finance Dataset. Scientific Data. https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-024-03341-w
